    • legalMoves

      public HashMap<String,​String> legalMoves​(Position start)
      The following legalMoves method first determines which side the piece belongs too then provides a list of all the possible move sets that a King piece can move based on whether it has moved or not which is a factor in casteling.
      Specified by:
      legalMoves in class Piece
      Parameters:
      start - start param contains x and y coordinates of the starting position of piece
      Returns:
      HashMap(String, String) return map contains a list of all the possible moves that a given piece can move

    • isLegalMove

      public boolean isLegalMove​(Position start, Position finish, Board a)
      isLegalMove first checks if the piece falls outside of the scope of the board which is an invalid move, then it enables a king to capture diagnolly/horizontally if an oppossing piece is in that location. Finally it disables the ability for a king piece to capture friendlies.
      Specified by:
      isLegalMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      start - start param contains x and y coordinates of the starting position of piece
      finish - finish param contains x and y coordinates of the starting position of piece
      a - a param calls in the current board that contains the location of all other pieces
      Returns:
      boolean boolean return which states whether the piece can legally make the move
